description: Detects potential container discovery via listing of certain kernel features in the "/proc" virtual filesystem
author: Seth Hanford
false_positives: Legitimate system administrator usage of these commands
Some container tools or deployments may use these techniques natively to determine how they proceed with execution, and will need to be filtered
name: Container Residence Discovery Via Proc Virtual FS
query: (process.executable:(*awk OR /.*\/[Cc][Aa][Tt]/ OR *grep OR /.*\/[Hh][Ee][Aa][Dd]/ OR /.*\/[Ll][Ee][Ss][Ss]/ OR /.*\/[Mm][Oo][Rr][Ee]/ OR /.*\/[Nn][Ll]/ OR /.*\/[Tt][Aa][Ii][Ll]/) AND ((process.command_line:/.*\/[Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc]\/2\/.*/) OR ((process.command_line:/.*\/[Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc]\/.*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\/[Cc][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Pp]/ OR /.*\/[Ss][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd]/)))))
